A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Must see the force awakens to understand the Last Jedi. This movie is such a beautiful journey and experience as a fan. The movie is confusing at times but it ultimately makes sense towards the end of the movie when they wrap up some of the plot. I think a lot of people are forgetting that this is movie 2 of 3 so of course there was going to be a cliff hanger.
